channel.title: Source run.bat
channel.description:
i cant get my run to work for my source. the current run is: [code=abap]@echo off java -cp bin;lib/*; src.org.dementhium.RS2Server pause[/code]
and i get this error: [code=abap]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: src/org/dementhium/RS 2Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: src.org.dementhium.RS2Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: src.org.dementhium.RS2Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Source run.bat
item.dc:creator: @saltywalrus saltywalrus
item.description:
@saltywalrus wrote:

i cant get my run to work for my source. the current run is:

@echo off java -cp bin;lib/*; src.org.dementhium.RS2Server pause

and i get this error:

[code=abap]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: src/org/dementhium/RS
2Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: src.org.dementhium.RS2Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: src.org.dementhium.RS2Server. Program will exit.

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
